subject: 2.4.1 實現固定加成類 Joker 模板 (5 個)
description:
為固定加成類 Joker 添加 EffectDef：

| JokerId | chips | mult | x_mult | money |
|---------|-------|------|--------|-------|
| Joker | - | +4 | - | - |
| GoldenJoker | - | - | - | +4 |
| Stuntman | +250 | - | - | - |
| Cavendish | - | - | x3.0 | - |
| Gros_Michel | - | +15 | - | - |

**實現**：
```rust
effect: EffectDef::Fixed { chips: 0, mult: 4, x_mult: 1.0, money: 0 }
```

**驗證**：單元測試
